summary: The module offers helper methods to assemble different parts of a prompt—such as system instructions, few‑shot examples, and user content—into a structured JSON payload suitable for sending to a language model. It also includes logic for extracting categories and handling various content block types, leveraging LangChain prompt templates.
business_intent: Enable applications to programmatically generate and format prompts for LLMs, simplifying the creation of consistent request bodies that incorporate dynamic content and few‑shot learning, thereby improving the reliability of downstream AI services.
